site_name: Land Off Brent Terrace,, London, NW2, (The Brent Terrace Triangles)
description: Application pursuant to Section 96A of the Town and Country Planning Act for non-material amendments to reserved matters approval for Plots 53 and 54 (reference 15/00720/RMA, dated 9 June 2015, as amended by 16/7574/NMA, dated ) pursuant to Section 73 planning permission F/04687/13 dated 23 July 2014 for the redevelopment of the Brent Cross Cricklewood Regeneration Scheme proposing amendments to Condition 5 (material samples) and Condition 6 (construction details) to amend the timing of the approval of such conditions;  Condition 1 (Approved plans) in respect of changes to Site Layout, Detailed Building Design, and Landscaping.
